property.name: user_add
property.value: insert into user_add values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE addCount=?

property.name: user_visit
property.value: insert into user_visit values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE visitcount=?,visitAllCount=?

property.name: member_add
property.value: insert into member_add values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE addMember=?,memberAllCount=?

property.name: member_visit
property.value: insert into member_visit values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE memberCount=?

property.name: session_add
property.value: insert into session_add values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE sessionCount=?

property.name: session_length
property.value: insert into session_length values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE sessionChaValue=?,sessionAvgLength=?

property.name: browser_add
property.value: insert into browser_add values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE addCount=?

property.name: browser_visit
property.value: insert into browser_visit values(?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE addCount=?,AllCount=?

property.name: browserMember_add
property.value: insert into browserMember_add values(?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE addCount=?,AllCount=?

property.name: browserMember_visit
property.value: insert into browserMember_visit values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE addCount=?

property.name: browserSession_add
property.value: insert into browserSession_add values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE addCount=?

property.name: browserSession_length
property.value: insert into browserSession_length values(?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE sessionChaValue=?,sessionAvgLength=?

property.name: browser_pv
property.value: insert into browser_pv values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE pvCount=?
